item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 21 Feb 2023
item.description:
1. Looking for Ideas for the Package Overview Page on OCaml.org
  2. prr, a fork of brr for non-browser JavaScript environments
  3. ICFP 2023 Artifact Evaluation Committee: call for nominations
  4. New Owl book: Architecture of Advanced Numerical Analysis Systems
  5. Improvement on the PPX ecosystem documentation
  6. The color associated with OCaml on Github is bad. Let's make it good
  7. Paul Biggar on Darklang
  8. Major updates to kcas in 0.1.8 and 0.2.0
  9. OUPS meetup march 2023
  10. Dune 3.7.0
